demoNotice: These are demo assets using placeholder images. Replace with actual Nestlé marketing materials.

messages.title: Launch Announcement Email
messages.content:
Subject: Introducing Our New Plant-Based Product

Dear Team,

We are excited to announce the latest addition to our product line – a groundbreaking plant-based product that champions both taste and sustainability.

Join us in bringing this innovation to life. Stay tuned for more details in our internal launch presentation.

Best,
Nestlé Team

messages.title: Training Session Reminder
messages.content:
Subject: Upcoming Training Session on New Product

Hello Team,

A friendly reminder about our training session tomorrow on the new plant-based product. Join us to learn more and get your questions answered.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

Best,
Training Coordinator

messages.title: Internal Engagement Kick-Off
messages.content:
Subject: Engage with Our New Product Launch

Hi Everyone,

We are thrilled to kick off the engagement phase for our new plant-based product. Participate in interactive workshops and contribute to our growing product narrative.

Let’s make this launch a success!

Warm Regards,
Internal Engagement Team

messages.title: Feedback Request
messages.content:
Subject: We Value Your Feedback on Our New Launch

Dear Team,

Your insights are invaluable. Please share your feedback on the launch and let us know how we can enhance future product rollouts.

Thank you!

Nestlé Feedback Team

messages.title: Continuous Support Announcement
messages.content:
Subject: Ongoing Support for Our New Product

Hi Team,

We're committed to providing continuous support for our new plant-based product. Access resources anytime and reach out for assistance if needed.

Together, we thrive!

Support Team

guides.title: Product Launch Strategy Guide
guides.content:
# Product Launch Strategy Guide

**To Equip Teams for a Successful Launch**

---

## Purpose

To provide a structured approach and resources for launching the new plant-based product, empowering teams with knowledge and guidelines to ensure a seamless internal rollout.

guides.title: Internal Training Resource
guides.content:
# Internal Training Resource

**Enhancing Product Knowledge within Teams**

---

## Overview

This guide provides comprehensive training materials and engagement strategies to ensure teams are well-versed in the product’s features and benefits.

guides.title: Engagement Workshop Activities
guides.content:
# Engagement Workshop Activities

**Fostering Internal Excitement**

---

## Activities

A collection of workshop ideas and interactive sessions designed to engage teams and encourage active participation in the product launch.

guides.title: Feedback Collection Guide
guides.content:
# Feedback Collection Guide

**Gathering Valuable Insights**

---

## Methods

This guide outlines effective feedback collection strategies to capture insights and improve future launches.

guides.title: Continuous Support Resource
guides.content:
# Continuous Support Resource

**Ensuring Ongoing Success**

---

## Support Tools

A comprehensive resource to provide continuous support and maintain momentum post-launch.
